org.workflowsim.utils
Class Parameters

java.lang.Object
  org.workflowsim.utils.Parameters

public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object

This class includes most parameters a user can specify in a configuration file

Since:
WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0

Method Detail

init

public static void init(Parameters.FTCMethod fMethod,
                        Parameters.FTCMonitor monitor,
                        Parameters.FTCFailure failure,
                        java.util.Map failureList,
                        int vm,
                        java.lang.String dax,
                        java.lang.String runtime,
                        java.lang.String datasize,
                        OverheadParameters op,
                        ClusteringParameters cp,
                        Parameters.SCHMethod scheduler,
                        java.lang.String rMethod)
A static function so that you can specify them in any place

Parameters:
fMethod, - the fault tolerant clustering method
monitor, - the fault tolerant clustering monitor
failure, - the failure generation mode
failureList, - the task failure list
vm, - the number of vms
dax, - the DAX path
runtime, - optional, the runtime file path
datasize, - optional, the datasize file path
op, - overhead parameters
cp, - clustering parameters
scheduler, - scheduling mode
rMethod - , reducer mode
